message: Hi guys! I usually work on iOS but many clients ask for Android development too. I'm looking for a book for beginning on Android dev, assuming my iOS experience. Am I the only one in this case? any one got a book to recommend?
Take a look at this rather useful guide http://clayallsopp.posterous.com/building-an-android-app-from-scratch-or-this
@kgutteridge yes that's exactly what I need. thanks
@jeffyt thanks, I already take a look at the official documentation
